root.name: Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express
root.description: Overview Hercule Poirot Murder on the Orient Express is based on the famous novels of Agatha Christie. While traveling on the Orient Express from Istanbul to Paris, detective Hercule Poirot is approached for protection by a mysterious American millionaire, Samual Ratchett. Samual claims someone is trying to murder him, but due to a lack of information Poirot declines the case... until Rachett turns up dead! With the assistance of Antoinette Marceau, an Orient Express employee, Hercule Poirot must overcome a sprained ankle and put this mystery to rest.
